snippet: Offering knowledge and experience by volunteering at a school can be far more satisfying for donors than simply writing a check.
abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column; offering knowledge and experience by volunteering at a school can be far more satisfying for donors than simply writing a check.
lead_paragraph: Offering knowledge and experience by volunteering at a school can be far more satisfying for donors than simply writing a check.

headline.print_headline: Some Prefer Giving Time, Not Money, to Schools
headline.seo: Giving Time to Schools Sometimes Beats Giving Money
headline.main: Some Prefer Giving Time, Not Money, to Schools
